titles.title: District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2011
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal medical assistance percentage for the District of Columbia under the Medicaid Program to 75 percent.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E587)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
